title: The Grand Piazza.  A Lofty Arch, with Vista on to an Arcade Surmounted by a Frieze
medium: etching, engraving, sulphur tint or open bite, burnishing on paper
provenance_text:
Frederick Keppel & Co., Inc., New York, NY; purchased by Kenneth Seaver [1877-1969], Pittsburgh, PA and Oakmont, PA, on February 25, 1928 until June 4, 1947 [1]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, June 1947.

Notes:
[1]. Purchased for $60; see original invoice in curatorial file.
